abstract: Why did the administration back away from the first government-run insurance program for long-term care? "We can make it work," said the actuary formerly in charge of developing the plan.
snippet: Why did the administration back away from the first government-run insurance program for long-term care? "We can make it work," said the actuary formerly in charge of developing the plan.
lead_paragraph: Let the post-mortem on the Class Act begin.

headline.main: Behind the Class Act, a Numbers Game
